snippet: The work of art, welcoming arriving international passengers at Terminal 4 since 2001, is scheduled to be removed by this spring and could be destroyed if a new home is not found.
abstract: David W Dunlap Building Blocks column on Curtain Wall art installation by sculptor Harry Roseman in Terminal 4 at Kennedy International Airport; work of art, which welcomes arriving passengers, is scheduled to be removed and could be destroyed if new home is not found.
lead_paragraph: The work of art, welcoming arriving international passengers at Terminal 4 since 2001, is scheduled to be removed by this spring and could be destroyed if a new home is not found.

headline.main: Art Installation at J.F.K. Faces Possible Destruction
headline.print_headline: Art Installation at J.F.K. Faces Possible Destruction
